src:
Nastalo za 70 tisočakov škode
Zagorelo je seno.
05 Nov 2019, 13:42 by T. V.
VELIKA PRISTAVA – Ob 7.34 so bili policisti obveščeni, da gori gospodarsko poslopje v Veliki Pristavi, veliko 30 krat 10 metrov. Posredovali so gasilci PGD Postojna, Pivka, Košana, Zagorje in Slavina in požar lokalizirali.Po prvih podatkih je v objektu zgorelo nekaj kmetijskih strojev, več bal sena, ogenj pa je uničil celotno ostrešje. V objektu so bile tudi živali, a so jih rešili, poroča uprava za zaščito in reševanje.Kriminalisti bodo opravili ogled požarišča. Materialna škoda je po prvih ocenah približno 70.000 evrov, so sporočili iz PU Koper.
text:
Damage incurred for 70,000
The hay burned.
05 Nov 2019, 12:42 by T.V.
GRAND PRISTAV - At 7.34 am police officers were informed that an outbuilding in Velika Pristava was burning, many times 30 meters 10 meters. Firefighters from the Postojna, Pivka, Košana, Zagorje and Slavina firefighters intervened and localized the fire. According to initial data, some farm machinery was burned at the facility, several bales of hay were fired, and the fire destroyed the entire roof. The facility also contained animals but was rescued, according to the Protection and Rescue Administration. Criminologists will conduct a fire inspection. The material damage is estimated at around EUR 70,000, according to the Koper Police Directorate.
